website_summaries.verdict: Quality, heavy stainless steel soup spoons are perfect for regular use.
pros: This large 12-piece set is durable and heavy
Weight is evenly distributed, giving the spoons a balanced feel
Works perfectly for dense, hearty soups and gumbo
The handle is a comfortable length
Spoons are dishwasher safe and have a flawless, mirror-like shine to them
cons: Bowl of the spoon may be too large for some people

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate. Get these soup spoons asap. They are long with a nice sized bowl and a good feel in my hand. I'm extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: some come with sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: over all they look good till you come across one with a sharp edge. I polished 5 out of 12 to remove the sharp edge. over all, adequate for the price. in general you get what you paid for... I polished all 12 edges as to be smooth, just disappointed in the over all quality control. but not tooooo upset, as they are low cost. nice box that they came in and each spoon was wrapped up as not to scratch themselves. a good deal not a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dean VT

customer_reviews.title: Love these !  Very high quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome spoon. The best deepest bowl on a spoon...I use for everything soup or stew, oatmeal or cereal and desserts!!! Just a great mouthful! Greatest spoon ever......also great as a spoon for the sick and bedridden! So glad I found these!!!
customer_reviews.author: JEAN-MARIE SEXTON

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant quality tableware
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are very shiny and go very well with my existing tableware. They are heavy and are a good fit in the hand. I eat a lot of soups and stews and these go great. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Love these spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are awesome looking. Longish handle with big round heads, we use them for everything! They are handling the wear prefectly.
customer_reviews.author: KAz

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons.
customer_reviews.text: We had a large party recently and served okra gumbo. These were so much better for guests to use, rather than smaller, plastic spoons. Definitely worth having. We use them too any time we each gumbo, soup or cereal.
customer_reviews.author: JuJu Bee

customer_reviews.title: A little too big
customer_reviews.text: So many soup spoons are on the small side. Not these! I feel like a kid using adult sized stuff, ya know? A little out of scale. But sturdy and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sleek soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the soup spoons for a short while. The weight of the spoon is nicely balanced. Dishwasher safe, too. A good all around spoon - so much so, that I placed an additional order as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Great spoons....love the look, size, feel in the hand and quality I'm happy I bought these.....should have bought them a long time ago. We use for soups, cereals, fruit bowls , rice bowls......
customer_reviews.author: gbutter

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to pick the spoons my husband liked and these were perfect. The right balance, length and the perfect size for soup, desserts, etc. My husband loves them and they look really good and will complement any other sets you own. Would recommend highly. Have a good day and God bless.
customer_reviews.author: Pollyanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, great quality and easy to hold with diabetic neuropathy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: They're just spoons, Really Really Great Spoons!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are of very good quality. Lots of chunky metal and very nice finish. A bit bigger than you probably expect from the pictures. I'm not sure what else you can say about spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my sister for Christmas as she has a large family and they frequently have soup for one of their meals when all are together for holidays and other special occasions. Then I had a large New Year's Eve party with soup being served so I borrowed them back and they were great--nice weight, handled well. You do have to sip from the side instead of the front but I guess that's the proper way to eat soup anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for soup, fruit, cereal, anything you can think of. They are nice and heavy, not cheap feeling like some. They wash nicely and don't show any signs of rusting or discoloring. These are the spoons we usually reach for now, instead of the spoons from my set.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Harb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. True to spec at a very reasonable price. Fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: EVANGELINE TRINIDAD

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how we ate soup before these spoons.
customer_reviews.text: My husband suggested that we needed spoons like we used to eat soup at Olive Garden a few days before I ordered them. Still don't know how we ate soup before getting these spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jean Leon

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN EVEN EAT SOUP!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THE FORKS, SO I THOUGHT, HEY I NEED SPOONS TOO. THEY ARE BIGGER THAN THE ROUND SPOONS I USED TO STEAL FROM RED LOBSTER, REALLY LIKE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: ROLAND JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Great product; great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and the feel. I like a soup spoon that is round. They are exactly what I was looking for and the price was unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: silver chipped off of spoons when we opened the package. I actually got a splinter in my finger from the silver.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Nice spoons! I bought them to use at a holiday party since I didn't have enough soup spoons. They are weighty, balanced, and have a nice finish. After 2 years they show no signs of wear such as dullness or flaking. I use them for soup and serving. I'm happy with this purchase and would recommend these spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase at a Great price
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are large with a nice heavy weight that is evenly distributed. The handle is comfortable in the hand and they are dishwasher safe. The spoons have a nice mirror finish which give that elegant appearance without the expensive pricetag.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Why are these the cutest spoons?! They are that thick, heavy, sturdy quality. Large, round spoons. Came individually wrapped in box and rubber banded together. Easy enough to wash & use right away. Very good quality and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: ChevellesHeroes

customer_reviews.title: Great Soup Spoons
customer_reviews.text: The dipper portion is not as deep as pho or miso spoon but it's good enough. They're made of stainless steel and wash well in a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Big soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are big soup spoons so be ware if you have a small mouth. Clean quickly after use or the food especially clings to the metal (gotta love holiday dishes) overall they were great no sharp edges on any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons, nice finish, and great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: bigsky

customer_reviews.title: not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for spoons for my toddlers. Didn't read the size correctly and they are obviously too big for them. We decided to keep them because my husband likes the size for his meals :)
customer_reviews.author: c.c

customer_reviews.title: A must have for soup lovers.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice soup spoons. They are well made, have a good weight and are a very nice size with a longer handle than most. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: I like to use large spoons for cooking as well as for eating purposes. These spoons work as well as I had hoped. They're very nice. Thier stainless steel and they have a nice feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Thawyzard

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for the Bucks$
customer_reviews.text: These were better than described. Yes, they are plain looking but they are solid with clean universal lines and will compliment any table. I highly recommend these spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Landry

customer_reviews.title: These soup spoon are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, perfectly sized soup spoons! Don't hesitate to purchase these. I made soup for a crowd and was so happy that I bought these!

customer_reviews.title: Finally a really sized spoon.
customer_reviews.text: finally a perfect sized spoon. these are perfect for grown teens and adults. great for soups, stews, chili and cereal.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These spoons not only work really well for things like soup and cereal, but they look really nice too

customer_reviews.title: Generous Soup Spoon
customer_reviews.text: Almost too big for my mouth (lol) but they match my other flatware. My boyfriend loves the generous scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Only way to eat soup!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons! I don't know why I didn't have them years ago. They are a must have in every kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: Ragged edges
customer_reviews.text: Spoons were large but cheaply made, very thin, many had ragged edges which can cut someones tongue so I had to return. I did get my refund in timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spaghetti twirlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for soup, but amazing for twirling spaghetti. Great quality and closely matches my current silverware.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spoons.

customer_reviews.title: Great for soups

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good sized soup spoon
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight nice shine big enough but not too big
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.  Quirk-Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Rough around the edge.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the look of the spoons but when I touched the edges around the spoon it was rough and dangerous to place on the mouth of any one. I am returning this product. Since I wrote this message I asked amazon for replacement, they did me Send me new before I returned the old ones. the new product was better, but still a couple spoons had rough edges. I am going to keep the replacements.
customer_reviews.author: CAYogi

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: The round part of one of the spoons (the food end, not the handle) just slit my thumb open while I was rinsing the spoon. The metal is obviously not filed or smoothed correctly. And to think this could have cut me or my child's MOUTH. I bought this in August and thought they looked great and worked fine, but not worth the trade-off of cutting your mouth and hand open with low quality finishing. I'm throwing out the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Best suited to an adult mouth
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely large, but that's what I was looking for. Best suited to an adult mouth. A few of them had sharpish edges that my children said hurt their mouths (and I did feel it on at least one), thus the reduction of one star. Otherwise, well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: OneNationUnderGod

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to order based on some reviews that mentioned rough unfinished edges to the soup spoons however, they arrived in perfect condition highly polished and very attractive. Also, was impressed that they were individually wrapped and beautifully boxed. The spoon bowl size is nice and large which I prefer for soups and chili, and the handles are longer than most which is an added bonus. Would definitely order these spoons again and recommend them to all.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Jetton

customer_reviews.title: Does the job; they ARE large
customer_reviews.text: I keep losing spoons in my household. I have no idea where they go. No idea at all. So I got these because we eat a lot of soups, stews, and saucy rice dishes. These are perfect for my husband and kids, but I find them just a little too large for my liking. But they go through the dishwasher just fine, seem sturdy and durable, and they do the simple job of delivering soups to the mouth without any difficulties whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Nightfall

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons, they are the perfect size and shape.
customer_reviews.author: Elizza

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME soup spoon!!
customer_reviews.text: So very pleased with design and size (length and spoon bowl depth) -- exactly what I was looking for in a soup spoon. I got spoiled with the texas size sturdy plastic soup spoons I bought at our local retailer -- and then, of course, they got discontinued and have not been able to find a replacement anywhere. Have tried other soup spoons -- they are either too short or the spoon bowl is inadequate. Had smaller ones when the girls were little and they called them "Mr. Roundies" -- well, Mr. Roundie is back and is on steroids -- LOVE THESE SPOONS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dracorogue
